00013 // graph_idx maps adjacency matrix elements to a linear array as follows.
00014 // The diagonal elements are not used.
00015 
00016 // 0 1 3 6 10 ...
00017 // 2 4 7 11 ...
00018 // 5 8 12 ...
00019 // 9 13...
00020 // 14 ...
00021 // ...
00022 
00023 #define div2(x) ((x)>>1)
00024 #define graph_idx(i,j) ((i)<=(j)?(div2((j)*((j)+1))+(i)):(div2((i)*((i)+1))+(j)))
